00023 #include <GisCommon.h>
00024 
00025 /// \brief
00026 /// GisIoTextReader reads from a binary stream containing UTF8 characters.
00027 /// It formats these UTF8 characters into Unicode wide characters. This class is 
00028 /// not yet complete, since the Read functions still have to be added.
00029 class GisIoTextReader : public GisDisposable
00030 {
00031 public:
00032     /// \brief
00033     /// Constructs a text reader on a file
00034     /// 
00035     /// \param fileName 
00036     /// Input name of the file to read.
00037     /// 
00038     /// \return
00039     /// Returns GisIoTextReader
00040     /// 
00041     GIS_API static GisIoTextReader* Create( GisString* fileName );
00042 
00043     /// \brief
00044     /// Constructs a text reader on a stream
00045     /// 
00046     /// \param stream 
00047     /// Input the stream to read.
00048     /// 
00049     /// \return
00050     /// Returns GisIoTextReader
00051     /// 
00052     GIS_API static GisIoTextReader* Create( GisIoStream* stream );
00053 
00054     /// \brief
00055     /// Gets the underlying stream. If a stream was passed to this object
00056     /// then this stream is returned.
00057     /// Otherwise, an auto-generated stream (wrapped around the  file name 
00058     /// that was passed to this object) is returned.
00059     /// 
00060     /// \return
00061     /// Returns the underlying stream.
00062     /// 
00063     GIS_API GisIoStream* GetStream();
00064 
00065 protected:
00066 /// \cond DOXYGEN-IGNORE
00067     GisIoTextReader() {}
00068     GisIoTextReader( GisIoStream* stream );
00069     virtual ~GisIoTextReader(void);
00070 /// \endcond
00071 
00072 private:
00073     /// the underlying stream.
00074     GisIoStreamP mStream;
00075 };
00076 
00077 /// \brief
00078 /// GisIoTextReaderP is a GisPtr on GisIoTextReader, provided for convenience.
00079 typedef GisPtr<GisIoTextReader> GisIoTextReaderP;
00080 
00081 #endif
